definition[0]: the container or material that a product is sold in
definition[1]: the process of wrapping something for sale
definition[2]: a way of making something seem attractive and interesting to people
example[2]: the packaging of the company image
definition[3]: material, boxes etc, used for wrapping goods to protect them, for example because they are being taken somewhere
definition[4]: the process of wrapping or packing goods so they are ready to be sent somewhere
example[4]: the world leader in food packaging and distribution
example[5]: The company has 15% of the $5 billion packaging business.
definition[5]: the process of putting together products, information, or other services and offering them for sale together
example[6]: the packaging by cable companies of telephone and television services
definition[6]: a way of presenting a plan, proposal etc so that it is more likely to be accepted
example[7]: the imaginative packaging of this unpopular tax
